docs.text: Power Systems Laboratory This is the homepage of Power Systems Laboratory at IIT Bombay. Features Supports inline math like \(x = \sin(\omega t)\) as well as block math like this: \begin{align} Ax &= b \\ x &= A^{-1}b \end{align} Videos can be included as well: References Books Manuals: pdf or download
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Testing page The mkdcos.yml file detail is as shown: site_name: Power Systems Laboratory nav: - Home: index.md - Topics: - Synchronous Machines: synchronous.md - Induction Machines: induction.md - Experiments: experiments.md - Forward Euler: forward_euler.md - Education: Education.md - About: about.md theme: name: material highlightjs: true hljs_languages: - yaml - rust markdown_extensions: - attr_list - md_in_html - pymdownx.highlight: anchor_linenums: true - pymdownx.inlinehilite - pymdownx.snippets - pymdownx.superfences - def_list - tables - pymdownx.tasklist: custom_checkbox: true - pymdownx.emoji: emoji_index: !!python/name:materialx.emoji.twemoji emoji_generator: !!python/name:materialx.emoji.to_svg - pymdownx.pathconverter: base_path: '..' relative_path: '..' absolute: false tags: 'a script img link object embed' extra_javascript: - 'https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/mathjax/2.7.2/MathJax.js?config=TeX-MML-AM_CHTML' The folder tree is as shown: tree /F │ mkdocs.yml │ └───docs │ Education.md │ index.md │ └───img Ashida.jpg Case_slides.pdf Flux_mpptcl.gif The following contents need to be tested: 1. Equation entries 1.1 Inline equations \(\s in ( \o mega t ) \) \\ ( \c os ( 2 \o mega t ) \\ ) Output: (\sin(\omega t)) \(\cos(2\omega t)\) 1.2 Equation array \b egin { align } a^2 + b^2 & = & 1 \\\\ a^2 + 2 \t imes b^2 & = & 2 \t imes \h at { V } _1 \e nd { align } Output: \begin{align} a^2 + b^2 &=& 1 \\ a^2 + 2\times b^2 &=& 2\times\hat{V}_1 \end{align} 2. Importing a figure 2.1 Figure (or file) on a link [ Ashida Relay ]( img/Ashida.jpg ) ! [ Ashida Relay ]( img/Ashida.jpg ){ width = "600" } [ Flux in a three-phase transformer ]( img/Flux_mpptcl.gif ) ! [ Flux in a three-phase transformer ]( img/Flux_mpptcl.gif ){ width = "550" } Output: Ashida Relay Flux in a three-phase transformer 2.2 Display figure with caption Output: Ashida feeder protection relay. 3. Displaying content in iframe 3.1 Display a video link Output: 3.2 Display a pdf slide Output: 4.
